title: 5 snaps of Toni Braxton looking waaay younger than 52
text:
5 snaps of Toni Braxton looking waaay younger than 52 share this

US singer Toni Braxton recently turned 52 and while she spent her special day with sister Tamar, we found ourselves wondering how she could possibly be a day over 30.

With her perfectly toned bod and flawless skin it’s hard to believe the star has lived for over half a century.

Check out these five age-defying snaps of Toni.

1. A body to die for

2. Triplets or mom with her two sons?

3. Flawless skin! (We wish we woke up looking like this)

4. Picture perfect

5. Bringing sexy back
description: With her perfectly toned bod and flawless skin it’s hard to believe the star has lived for over half a century.
